3323573f-7128-40f6-932f-d09addca5096.description: "NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Startup Badge recognises India's leading DeepTech Startups who have been inducted into the program through a rigorous evaluation process conducted by industry leaders with 6-7% Acceptance ratio. NASSCOM DeepTech Club is a global community of mentors and entrepreneurs that enables entrepreneurs and business mentors to create powerful connections, solve problems and build successful businesses together. Helping Startups Take A Leap... From Surviving To Thriving!"
3323573f-7128-40f6-932f-d09addca5096.name: NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Startup Badge

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

entity.name: National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

badge_template_activities.title: The startups are evaluated basis following criteria - 1. Technology depth and understanding 2. Product Focus & Stage 3. Unique Idea/Innovation 4. Founding Team 5. Country of origin

a877612a-b27f-49eb-92df-769897be2904.description: "NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Mentor Badge recognises industry leaders alis mentor who go that extra mile to help DTC Startups & for the relationships they build which last long even after the program. NASSCOM DeepTech Club is a global community of mentors and entrepreneurs that enables entrepreneurs and business mentors to create powerful connections, solve problems and build successful businesses together. Helping Startups Take A Leap... From Surviving To Thriving!"
a877612a-b27f-49eb-92df-769897be2904.name: NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Mentor

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

entity.name: National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

badge_template_activities.title: The mentor is evaluated basis the time devoted in mentoring / helping DTC startups leveraging professional experience, domain knowledge, professional network & prior experience

0c4b5c89-713e-4b34-a1d5-43db08ec1bc4.description: The NASSCOM ProductSkills (NPS) - Volunteer Badge acknowledges the efforts & contribution of zealous professionals in making India a Product Superpower in the world and a force to reckon with in the software product industry. With the mission of creating 50K+ product professionals, NASSCOM ProductSkills provides the platform to learn, engage and collaborate with product leaders from across the globe.
0c4b5c89-713e-4b34-a1d5-43db08ec1bc4.name: NASSCOM ProductSkills - Volunteers

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

entity.name: National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

badge_template_activities.title: The NASSCOM ProductSkills (NPS) Volunteers are the product enthusiasts, who apart from their day job work with the NPS team to achieve the goals towards making India's largest community of product professionals. Based upon their interest areas, the volunteers contribute actively to one or multiple pillars of NPS - Upskilling, Community & Evangelism and Mentorship.

0499d385-76b5-4fbe-968c-9fbc4d7371ac.description: NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Core Team Member Badge recognises industry leaders who are driven by passion to build India's largest DeepTech ecosystem. They work with NASSCOM team in owning and executing Deeptech Club program. NASSCOM DTC is a global community of industry leaders & founders that enables entrepreneurs and business mentors to create powerful connections, solve problems and build successful businesses together. Helping Startups Take A Leap... From Surviving To Thriving!
0499d385-76b5-4fbe-968c-9fbc4d7371ac.name: NASSCOM DeepTech Club - Core Team

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

entity.name: National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

badge_template_activities.title: The core team members are appointed on the basis of exceptional dedication & contribution (time & effort) towards taking DTC Program to the next level. Leaders in core team work with NASSCOM on daily basis to build, nurture & add value to the DeepTech ecosystem.

a81a086f-139a-47a3-bcee-7f1efbb4156f.description: NASSCOM ProductSkills (NPS) - Core Team badge recognises the Industry Leaders who are the strategic think tank behind NASSCOM ProductSkills charter. Driven by passion to make India a Product Superpower, they work with NASSCOM in bridging the gaps & solving challenges that exist in the software product talent landscape. With the mission of creating 50K+ product professionals, NASSCOM ProductSkills provides platform to learn, engage and collaborate with product leaders from across the globe.
a81a086f-139a-47a3-bcee-7f1efbb4156f.name: NASSCOM ProductSkills - Core Team

issuer.summary: issued by National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

entity.name: National Association of Software & Services Companies (NASSCOM)

badge_template_activities.title: The core team members are appointed on the basis of exceptional dedication & contribution (time & effort) towards taking NPS program to the next level. Leaders in core team work with NASSCOM on daily basis to build & nurture the largest community of product managers in India.

622a904e-26c9-422f-9c04-901aefb3c7db.description: The certificate was issued to participants who attended and completed the masterclass on 'Integrating Excellence and Empowerment Using SAP Integration Suite', conducted by SAP at 'NASSCOM Product Conclave 2021'
